actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the leasing of space for new departments, agencies, and instrumentalities of the United States within the greater Washington, D. C., metropolitan area.

summary.text: Prohibits the leasing of any space in the Greater Washington, District of Columbia, metropolitan area for any Federal department, agency, or instrumentality established after January 1, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the leasing of space for new departments, agencies, and instrumentalities of the United States within the greater Washington, D. C., metropolitan area.
